review_data.title: Lovely University
review_data.content: The University of Zurich is a lovely place.Well maintained & beautiful. The restaurant is average good for the students.

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: A cheap and cheerful place for a meal. A choice of three hot meals or a wide range of salard bar Seating available both inside and outside

review_data.title: Quick and safe foods in the school
review_data.content: I and my family had some lunch here after enjoying the zoological museum in the university. This students restaurant was well designed and it was easy to use. They offered 4 different menues including vegits and pasta. We were not university students so we could...More

review_data.title: Good for students
review_data.content: This restaurant serves meat person and vegetarian. The taste is average, however it fits to student budget and warm. You can ask for more if you think you are starving. :)
